title: Snozzcumber
data:
{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Comestible |name=Snozzcumber |cost=? |weight=5.0}} {{flavour|A repulsive, cucumber-shaped vegetable.}} A '''snozzcumber''' is a vegetable which normally provides 1,500 [[nutrition]]. Regardless of dietary habits, all [[species]] find that snozzcumbers taste "truly putrid," though this has no effect on gameplay. '''Carnivore'''
Rank 1: 1,000.
Rank 2: 500.
Rank 3: 0. '''Herbivore'''
Rank 1: 2,000.
Rank 2. 2,500.
Rank 3. 3,000. ==Trivia== Snozzcumbers are originally referenced in the book [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_BFG The BFG] by Roald Dahl. ==History== In [[0.15]], all fruits and vegetables were condensed into the universal "[[fruit]]" item.
